profile.description1: Strong team player and self motivated professional.
profile.description3: Love for well done job and best practices.
profile.description4: Ability to work under pressure and multitask.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description1: Creating a website from scratch, for yoga online classes, using a streaming provider. Created with, ReactJs, Redux, Router, styled components, Axios, mySQL, Express, NodeJs, TDD, Swagger and integration with stream provider.
experience.description2: Development of mobile and backoffice app, to control capacity on sports facilities. Participation and contribution in the development of severals projects in the company associated with the basketball federation. Using technologies like ReactJs, React Native, React Native Web, TypeScript and Agile methodologies.
experience.description3: Coding for more than 930h in less than 3 months. Team-work front-end project in 2 weeks. Individual Full-Stack project using React, MongoDb, Express, API Rest, TDD, NodeJs, Git, Trello, etc.

chat.title: Full-stack project implemented with ReactJs using websockets.
